FuncDef: This command specifies the forwarding class name. The forwarding class name represents an egress queue. Thefcfc-namerepresents a CLI parent node that contains sub-commands or parameters describing the egress characteristics of the queue and the marking criteria of packets flowing through it. Thefccommand overrides the default parameters for that forwarding class defined in the network default policypolicy-id1.

ParaDef.Info: The case-sensitive, system-defined forwarding class name for which policy entries will be created. Values-be, l2, af, l1, h2, ef, h1, nc.

ExtraInfo: Default: See Default Shared Queue Policy Values for undefined forwarding class values.
